description: This file provides global ambient type definitions, re-exports, and module declarations to ensure TypeScript includes custom shims and API modules during build. It acts as a central type aggregator for the project, referencing external type definitions and declaring a module for API functions used throughout the codebase.

methods.name: unassignResource
methods.description: Removes a resource from a case.

methods.name: export function fetchJSON(path: string, options?: Record<string, any>): Promise<any>; fetchJSON
methods.description: Performs a fetch request and returns JSON data.

methods.name: graphql
methods.description: Executes a GraphQL query with optional variables.

ctags.name: fetchJSON
ctags.pattern: /^  export function fetchJSON(path: string, options?: Record<string, any>): Promise<any>;$/
